title: 3.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Eric has been assigned a task to test an email application. Describe the functionalities he should test to ensure a robust application. Include both basic functions (sending and receiving emails, attachments, and so on) and any additional features crucial for an email application (like spam filters, labels, and so on). Create a list of test cases.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
